hero.title: UNLEASHING YOUR BRAND THROUGH MERCHANDISE THAT TRULY CONNECTS WITH YOUR

items.question: FROM DESIGN TO DELIVERY — HOW DOES IT WORK?
items.answer: Your merchandise journey with TrauMerch begins with a conversation about your mission. Our designers prepare artworks that show exactly how your items will look. After your approval, we create a sample based on our templates and send it to your address for review — or, if time is critical, we can move directly to production. Once confirmed, we handle full production and deliver the entire order to you.

items.question: WHAT IS THE MINIMUM ORDER QUANTITY (MOQ)?
items.answer: We work with quantities as low as 50 units, making it easy for even small teams to get started. Some product categories begin at 100 or 250 units, which you can confirm in our catalogue or with your design team. Samples are produced as single units — or multiple samples if you want to test different designs.

items.question: HOW LONG DOES PRODUCTION AND DELIVERY TAKE?
items.answer: One Day, One Week, One Month. Our motto holds for all standard orders — design in one day, samples in one week, delivery in one month. For larger projects or orders with special timelines may extend beyond one month, depending on complexity and volume. We'll provide an exact schedule tailored to your project.

items.question: CAN WE REQUEST SAMPLES BEFORE PRODUCTION?
items.answer: Samples are not an extra — they are part of understanding your product. We always produce samples before final production. Only in cases of ultra-fast delivery, and if you agree, can we move directly to bulk production based on approved designs.

items.question: DO YOU OFFER ECO-FRIENDLY PRODUCT OPTIONS?
items.answer: Sustainability is built into the way we work. We carefully select suppliers who hold certifications in eco-friendly production and materials. Every partner is reviewed through a strict internal process to ensure responsibility is present at every stage of production.

items.question: DO YOU HANDLE INVOICING AND VAT WITHIN THE EU?
items.answer: As an Austrian company, we issue invoices and calculate VAT in full compliance with European legislation. Our invoicing processes are structured for both single-person businesses and large corporations, ensuring correct and transparent documentation.

items.question: CAN YOU DELIVER MERCHANDISE TO MULTIPLE LOCATIONS?
items.answer: By default, orders are shipped to a single address. We are happy to send to a second address at no additional cost. For three or more delivery locations, we ask to discuss details with your sales manager, as additional fees may apply.

items.title: CORPORATE & EVENT MERCHANDISE
items.description: We create branded merchandise for employees and events that brings people together. From welcome kits and team gear to conference giveaways, our solutions ensure every item strengthens connection and brand culture.

items.title: BUSINESS GIFTS
items.description: We design and deliver thoughtful gifts for clients, partners, and employees. From premium selections to tailored packaging, every gift leaves a lasting impression and builds stronger business relationships.

items.title: PRIVATE LABEL COLLECTIONS
items.description: We develop exclusive private label products tailored to your brand. From multi-SKU collections and unique designs to secondary packaging, we bring ideas to life and expand your market presence with distinctive merchandise.

items.title: INFLUENCER ACTIVATION & SEEDING
items.description: We build influencer and brand seeding programs designed for impact. With custom packaging, curated merchandise, and targeted distribution, we help brands spark authentic content and reach the right audiences.

items.title: SMART PLATFORM
items.description: Our digital platform simplifies every step of merchandise management. From ordering and stock control to distribution, it gives brands the tools to scale their merch programs efficiently and transparently.

accordion.question: Description
accordion.answer: This t-shirt is made of 100% organic cotton and features a heavy quality for both comfort and durability. It has a casual, unisex medium fit. The t-shirt is certified by GOTS, Oeko-Tex 100, and Peta-Approved Vegan, ensuring that it meets ethical and environmental standards.

accordion.question: Specification
accordion.answer: Material: 100% organic cotton • Size: XXS-3XL • Weight: 215gsm • Fit: Regular, unisex • Details: Single jersey, ring spun combed, fabric washed • Certifications: GOTS, Peta-Vegan Approved, Oeko-tex100, Fairwear

accordion.question: Customization
accordion.answer: Technique: Embroidery, printing, digital printing • Position: Front, back, sleeve

cta.title: READY TO CREATE MERCHANDISE FOR YOUR BRAND?
cta.description: Let's bring your ideas to life — from first design to delivery, we make the process simple and reliable.

quote.formTitle: From Messenger to Quote — it's that simple.
quote.thankYouDescription: Let's bring your ideas to life — from first design to delivery, we make the process simple and reliable.

items.heading: TOTAL CUSTOMISATION
items.description: We don't work with off-the-shelf solutions. Every product is adapted to your brand identity, from design details to packaging. You have the freedom to request any element you want—coloured drawstrings on hoodies or a leather strap on caps—everything is possible.

items.heading: END-TO-END SUPPORT
items.description: We guide you through every step - from idea and design to sampling, production, and delivery. Instead of dealing with multiple suppliers, you work with one reliable partner. That way, things stay simple, and the process runs smoothly without you having to worry about coordination.

items.heading: LOCAL COMPLIANCE
items.phrase: One founder. One giant. Always correct.
items.description: Whether you are a solo founder or a multinational, we handle invoices, VAT, and legal details according to EU standards. Our experience with different company structures means we know the challenges and solutions. This ensures that compliance is always clear and correct, no matter your size.

items.heading: QUALITY CONTROL
items.description: Every production batch is checked before leaving the factory. Our team reviews samples, materials, and finishing to ensure nothing below standard ever reaches you. This consistent quality makes long-term cooperation reliable and predictable.

items.heading: FAST TRACK
items.phrase: 1 Day Quote. 1 Week Samples. 1 Month Delivery.
items.description: We know speed is critical. That's why we commit to quotes in 1 day, samples in 1 week, and deliveries in 1 month. Our streamlined workflows and supplier network make it possible. *Typical lead times under standard conditions. Larger projects may vary.

items.heading: SUSTAINABLE OPTIONS
items.description: Sustainability isn't an add-on, it's part of how we work. We source eco-friendly materials and provide greener production choices on request. This allows you to align merchandise with your brand values and future expectations.
